Description:
A GRAND ENTERTAINER
LIVINGSTON ESTATE, CRANBOURNE EAST: Built to perfection and finished to a level rarely seen, this custom built home is set in the blossoming Livingston estate and is in close proximity to all of the conveniences that Cranbourne East has to offer.
Fronted by a gorgeous facade with a feature front portico, you step inside to find a floor plan offering ample natural light, high gloss timber flooring and a central passageway that leads you through meals area to the separate theatre room and towards the vast family/living area.
The stunning hostess kitchen is one of the main selling points and is complete with stone benches, mirrored glass splashback and stainless appliances including a generous walk-in pantry with additional bench space.
This gem is set within the popular Livingston estate and is surrounded by a long list of local amenities and facilities including amazing sporting complexes, extensive parkland and education options including Casey Grammar, St. Peters Secondary College and Chisholm TAFE!
Each of the 4 bedrooms are well proportioned and feature built-in robe facilities, the master retreat complete with a walk-in wardrobe and a lovely ensuite to match the family bathroom with separate toilet.
As you can appreciate with any high end product, the property has been treated with the full complement of extras including an alarm system, security cameras, reverse cycle heating and refrigerated cooling.
Within a short drive to freeway access and all of the amenities located in the townships of Berwick, Clyde and Cranbourne, this sensational opportunity is only moments away from the popular Clyde Primary School, Casey RACE Recreation & Aquatic Centre and Casey Indoor Sports Centre. With additional shopping precincts in Pasadena, Selandra Rise/Cascades on Clyde and The Hunt Club local amenities are always going to be close by, whilst the recently revamped Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre offers an abundance of cafes and restaurants. Don't forget the proposed Cranbourne East train station and the existing ones situated right throughout the South East!
For more information and inquiries please call Vikram on 0430392918 or Ajay on 0403351577.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.

Description:
EXCEPTIONAL FAMILY LIVING!
Located within the highly sought-after Estate in front of Casey Race offering a lifestyle surrounded by parks, playgrounds and Casey Fields sporting facilities this beautifully presented low maintenance home is perfect for the first home buyers or new families. Featuring:
- Four bedrooms includes a master bedroom with a spacious walk in wardrobe and two other bedrooms with built in wardrobes and one with WIR
- Separate front living area overlooking the street and to accommodate many guests
- Two bathrooms includes light and bright ensuite, and the second bathroom has a separate toilet for that extra piece of privacy
- Spacious kitchen with of overhead cupboard space, quality dishwasher, 900 mm cooktop, stainless steel appliance and stone benchtop
- Open family/dining area with outdoor access and split system air conditioner
- Low maintenance backyard and concrete around the house
- Double car garage with large driveway
Other feature: landscaped front and backyard, solar panels, downlights, quality wooden blinds, glass splashback, porcelain tiles, etc
Situated within a short drive to freeway access and all the amenities you will ever need including walking distance to the primary school scheduled to open in 2020. Additional schools nearby include Cranbourne Primary School, Cranbourne Secondary, Lighthouse Christian College, Saint Thomas Apostle Catholic Primary School and Marnebek School. With such a suburb location and practical layout, this home is sure to suit growing families, investors or first home buyers.
Don't delay and call Yogi Patel on 0451 719 161 to book in an inspection.
Photo ID required for all opens.
Note: Every care has been taken to verify the accuracy of the details in this advertisement, however we cannot guarantee its correctness. Prospective purchasers are requested to take such action as is necessary, to satisfy themselves of any relevant matters.

Description:
THE FAMILY FAVOURITE
SALE BY SET DATE: Saturday 21st December 6.00PM (unless sold prior)
Perfectly suited to growing families, this home is sure to tick the boxes of all home buyers and investors currently searching the marketplace for the perfect purchase offering outstanding value for money whilst within a very desirable location.
The spacious family room is the heart of the home, the perfect setting for love, laughter and joy to unfold adjacent to a generous dining and kitchen area. In the kitchen you will be delighted to find an abundance of bench and storage space to make cooking for the family effortless when utilising the gas cook top, stainless dishwasher and oven.
A generous master bedroom features a walk-in wardrobe and full ensuite whilst a central bathroom services the remaining three bedrooms, all with built in wardrobes. Ducted heating and an additional brand new reverse cycle ducted split system will ensure the home will be the perfect temperature all year round.
Accommodating family and friends is a breeze knowing the family fun can continue outside beneath the large undercover pergola area overlooking a fantastic sized grassed back yard providing the perfect space for children to be out playing and keeping busy! A garden shed continues to add to the substantial storage of the home.
Nestled within a beautiful tree lined street of a quiet and family focused pocket of Cranbourne East, this well-presented brick veneer home is situated only minutes walk from Hunt Club Village Shopping Centre, Public transport, multiple Primary and Secondary Schools, Chisholm Tafe, Childcare and Medical facilities.

A beautiful location to build your family home in Cranbourne
Located in the highly sought after location, this titled premium parcel of land is in the heart of Cranbourne East measures 448 sqm approx. This is a fantastic opportunity for anyone wanting to build their dream home or investment property.
Situated close to local Shopping Centre, TAFE College, Casey Grammar School, Public Transport, Child Care Centre and easy access to south Gippsland freeway
Marinda park train station and other facilities such as Casey Fields Regional Athletics and Aquatic Centre and the 360 hectare Royal Botanic Gardens Cranbourne are only moments away.
For more information and enquiries please call Waseem on 0433 880 999 and Leon 0415 205 032

- Flat Land

- 14m Frontage

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT/ UNDER OFFER
CRANBOURNE EAST: Here is the perfect opportunity to break into the Hunt Club market.
The free flowing floor plan features 3 generous bedrooms, the good size master bedroom offers a WIR with full ensuite. The other of the bedrooms all have BIR's and nearby to the family bathroom with bath and shower facilities.
The hostess kitchen is the central hub of the home and is finished with a plenty of cupboard space, large bench space, tiled splash back, S/S appliances including oven, gas cook top, rangehood and dishwasher.
Take advantage of the 2 separate living zones making year-round formal and informal entertaining a breeze! Relax with a good movie or a book with the front living area, carefree day to day living will be enjoyed in the family zone or grab a seat around the kitchen table with the family in the dining area.
Added internal extras are gas ducted heating, s/s cooling, a mix of tiles and carpet and neutral tones throughout.
Step outside and be greeted by a great size, both front and rear yard with sensational opportunity to put you on personal touches on and add a pergola (S.T.C.A). A wide lengthy concrete driveway leads to the remote double garage with internal access.
The Hunt Club is a multi-award winning estate offering numerous parks, wetlands, walking and bicycle paths as well as a complete range of childcare, primary (Cranbourne East Primary) and secondary schools (Cranbourne East Secondary College). Buses weave through the estate making the newly built shopping centre complete with Woolworths & Aldi easily accessible. Recycled water, high speed broadband and environmentally friendly designs are all part of the estate.
At Ray White Cranbourne our price indications are based upon probable market value, the likely selling price and the vendor's expectations. You can view with confidence that the vendors will sell within the range with favourable terms and conditions.
Our floor plans are for representational purposes only and should be used as such. We accept no liability for the accuracy or details contained in our floor plans.
*PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT OPEN FOR INSPECTIONS*!

Description:
Finish or develop
Located in the prestigious Hunt Club Estate, a rapidly growing suburb is these previously completed 35sq Home on an 882m2 block (Approx.) has previously gone through a house fire and has since gone through insurance to have new framework inside, New roof Trusses and a new roof put on. This would make a great family home or investment property or even a potential 3 Townhouse/ Unit site as a previous buyer has spoken to the council and they will support a knockdown and rebuild STCA.
Other inclusions:
- Shipping container w/ all brand new 900m appliances never used, tiles, bathtub, shower, vanities, benchtops, lights, range hood, microwave, and much more.
This property within short walking distance to the Hunt Club Village Shopping Centre complex, Cranbourne East Primary and Secondary Schools, childcare Centre and public transport. And a short drive to the Cranbourne park shopping Centre.

Description:
422 AND NOTHING TO DO!!
Fairway greens greet you as walk the driveway to your potential Prime Projects built home, standing strong over the past two years and with an additional gate offering side access for camper van, boats or extra car space.
Casting warmth as you walk in, wide hallways and high ceilings presents the charming study and entrance via double door to the separate secondary living room with a massive laundry nearby.
An open plan living, kitchen and dining area create the central beacon for this family home. The kitchen is fully equipped with 40mm stone bench tops, 900mm Stovetop, stainless steel appliances, butlers pantry with sink, wide fridge cavity and plenty of cupboard space all overlooking the sunlit dining area and massive living.
Located on the second floor are the four bedrooms, generously sized master bedroom with a spacious WIR which is shelved then access to the stunning ensuite with double mirrors and double basin. The remaining 3 bedrooms all large in size are equipped double BIRs with the family bathroom nearby.
The alfresco opens up from the main dining to provide a better entertaining experience with the ability to actually kick a footy in the back yard being an experience everyone can get around all year long, with professional landscaped garden and well-kept lawns.
Located in in the much sought after the Grow estate, close to natural parks, lakes and playgrounds as well as Casey Race and the Indoor Sports Centre, childcare centres, shopping centres, many schools and public transport (most only 5 minutes away). Dont forget the planned Cranbourne East train Station.
Extras Include-
- Ducted heating - Evaporative cooling/split system
- Soft close drawers (kitchen) - Two powder rooms
- Side driveway access - Low maintenance gardens

Description:
UNDER CONTRACT
Nestled away in the highly sort after Hunt Club Estate is this immaculate home that is a perfect start for a first home buyer and should be on any smart investors radar. Built by Dennis Family Home this one is not to be missed.
Inside, 3 spacious bedrooms! Master fit with a full ensuite and a walk in robe. The other two bedrooms fit with built-in robes. The open plan living at the rear of the home features a well-appointed modern kitchen with lots of counter and storage space, the kitchen is complemented with a separate meals area and a cosy living area that presents as the ideal place for relaxing and entertaining.
Step outside and there is a huge pergola area just waiting for you to have your friends over on a hot summer's night. Outside is also a neat low maintenance garden!
Low maintenance living is the best description for this property with nothing needed to be done other than to move in and enjoy the lifestyle that only the Hunt Club has to offer!
Added features include gas heating, air conditioning, lock up garage, recycled water and loads more! The Hunt Club is an award-winning estate comprising of public transport, wetlands, Cranbourne East prep to 12 school and the Cranbourne East shopping precinct.

Description:
Brand New Master Piece in the Popular Mayfield Estate
(Property Back on Market - Finance fallen through for previous purchaser)
This beautiful brand new single storey home is located in one of the most sought-after pockets of Cranbourne East within close proximity to Cranbourne Primary School, Cranbourne Secondary, Casey Fields Athletics Centre, Casey RACE Aquatic Centre, Shopping & Parks. This family home effortlessly combines family living & entertaining alongside everyday family functionality.
Four good sized bedrooms three complete with BIR's and carpeted floors provide comfortable family living with a spacious master that includes an en suite and WIR's. Gorgeous wooden floors feature throughout the open plan kitchen, dining and living areas adding a contemporary touch. A Casual sitting area or second living further enhances the floorplan which could be used as dual entertainment or play area for the kids.
The two bathrooms are generously sized, modern and include the highest quality fittings. The shared bathroom features a large bath with a separate toilet and laundry with additional storage. A double lock up garage, ducted heating & NBN connectivity all complete this outstanding opportunity.
Main features include:
- 4 good sized bedrooms with carpeted floors and BIR's
- Spacious master bedroom with WIR and en-suite
- 2 stylish bathrooms, including en-suite and separate toilet and laundry
- Open plan kitchen, dining and living with wooden floors
- Separate living room for extra family fun
- Heating throughout and split system air conditioning for the main living area
- Low maintenance, beautifully landscaped garden complete with fruit trees
- Remote double garage with side access for convenience
*** First Home Buyers - Might be eligible For 10k Gov.Grant and stamp duty savings
Look no further, come to the inspections and be the first to make an offer!!!

Description:
Impressive Family Living! The Opportunity is Now!
Situated in a peaceful pocket of the Cascades on Clyde estate, this immaculately presented and fastidiously maintained home allows easy family living suiting those wanting a low maintenance lifestyle. Built on a block size of 578 sqm, the home offers plenty of natural light and modern neutral tones throughout with a smart floorplan providing multiple spaces to comfortably entertain and accommodate the largest of gatherings inside and out!
Comprising of 4 generous bedrooms, the master with walk in robe and ensuite, 3 extremely sizeable living zones - a formal lounge, separate rumpus/theatre room with double doors for privacy and the central family room allowing every member of the family to relish in their own space. A central galley style fully equipped kitchen boasts ample bench space with overhead cupboards, stainless steel appliances, Bosch dishwasher, double pantry and sizeable breakfast bar.
Moving outside, the fully covered Alfresco is ideal for entertaining all year round, perfect for those summertime BBQs with family and friends. An easy care backyard offers privacy with high fences and large lawn area - a wonderful space for the kids and pets to play and roam. Add a playground, veggie patch or extra trees - whatever takes your fancy!
The list of standout extras include :-
- Tiling to the traffic areas
- Downlights throughout
- Gas ducted heating
- Evaporative cooling
- Separate Powder Room
- Fitted shelving & drawers to all Robes
- Mirrored sliding robe doors to Bed 2, 3 & 4
- Hills Home Hub
- Security doors
- Internal access via the double garage
- Backyard access via rear garage roller door
- 3x3m garden shed
- Side gate walk through access
- Recycled Water to the estate
- Coloured concrete pathways & exposed aggregate driveway
Enjoy lifes conveniences at your doorstep... Location is King! Closeby to the Cascades wetlands & walking tracks and local Bus Stop plus a choice of desired schools such as - Cranbourne East Primary & Secondary schools & Casey Grammar, with Casey Fields sports ovals & Casey Race swimming centre a short drive plus Selandra Rise & Hunt Club Shopping precincts are easily accessible for you and your family!
Dont miss this outstanding buying opportunity in a popular desired community with nothing to do but move in - will this be your next home?
Call Michael or Brenda - The Real Estate Studds - for more information or we look forward to meeting you at the next Open Home!

- Spacious light filled master suite with en-suite and walk in robe

Description:
TRANSITIONAL DESIGN !!!
Create a balance between comfort and style in your new home with this transitional design, enviably positioned in a highly sort after quiet court location. This stunning residence blends elements of contemporary and traditional design styles.
Formal lounge and open plan living make this light filled property stand out from the rest with the second living area located to the rear of the property where you can absorb the sunshine.
The kitchen is a showpiece meeting area adjacent to the family/dining which features a blackwood timber Hampton style kitchen with ample cupboard space and quality appliances, overlooking the spacious outdoor entertainment area and lovely garden surround.
The modern features throughout this home offers a slightly farm -house feel and spacious living areas makes this home feel larger in size.
The master bedrooms adds character to the property with full ensuite and corner spa bath, for those who love to unwind and a beautiful bench window seat creates a lovely reading nook or your favourite coffee spot.
Additionally, there are three more bedrooms which include built in robes for extra storage space. Quality in this home does not exclude excellence. The rear yard is an entertainers delight, with spacious lush green lawns providing plenty of room for the kids to play.
Furthermore, some of the homes long list of extras include ducted heating, split system plus double garage with both internal and external access.
Perfectly located only few minutes away from parks and reserves, all amenities including transport, primary and secondary schools. Sporting facilities, Cranbourne Botanic Gardens, Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre plus M1 and East-Link Freeways.
Internal area
210m²

Description:
Big & beautiful 5 bedrooms + 4 living areas -House and Land would cost close to $900,000
Located in the highly sought after Livingstone Estate, this elegantly polished, two storey family haven offers a fantastic opportunity. Surrounded by an array of quality homes & packed with plenty of extras this stunning home is bound to impress even the fussiest of home seekers!
Features include:
- Huge Master suite with generous walk-through robe plus a large full ensuite featuring twin vanities & an oversized shower in addition to its very own private balcony
- A further four exceptionally well-sized bedrooms which are all completed with double built-in robes providing ample space for both family & guests
- The classy kitchen truly is the heart of this home featuring a 900mm stainless steel oven & gas cooktop, dishwasher, generous walk-in pantry, split system heating/cooling unit for year round comfort and a stylish central stone island bench
- Four fantastic living zones to choose from downstairs you will find a separate lounge to the front of the home plus a spacious dining / living area, a second large family zone adjoining the beautiful kitchen plus yet another sizeable upstairs parent's / teenager's retreat
- The outdoor alfresco is easily accessed via the dining living area and features the convenience of surrounding cafe blinds
- Other features include: Ducted heating, evaporative cooling, 2.5 car remote control garage with internal access to the home and an abundance of cupboard space!
And if all that wasn't enough wait until you see the location! Position perfect the home is close to Casey Fields Sporting Complex, bus stops, parks, local shops & the soon to be completed Casey Fields Primary School. Homes like this don't come along often, so what are you waiting for? Call Matt Dewan on 0416 638 019 or Brent Day on 0421 085 092 NOW to secure your inspection!

Description:
Family Haven in the Hunt Club Estate
Well-presented spacious four bedroom family home with all the essentials for fine family living.
Offering four bedrooms, two separate living areas, kitchen offers stainless steel appliances with ample bench and cupboard space. Master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe. Two bedrooms with BIRs. Outside you will find a large outdoor concreted area. Double lock up garage with rear access for additional parking.
Other features include ducted heating, split reverse cycle air-conditioning, quality blinds, roller shutters, security door, dishwasher, down lights and Recycled Water plus lots more! Situated on a corner allotment of approx. 593m² in size, there is the possibility of side access and the property has long driveway which is ideal for a multiple car parking, boat and caravan, an absolute rarity in this area.
This properties location features a hop, skip and jump to the school and a short walk to local day care centre, public transport, hunt club village and minutes away to the heart of the Cranbourne shopping precinct, Casey RACE - Recreation/ Aquatic Centre and Casey Fields multi-sports complex.
A newly developed walking/running track will keep you fit and the children will enjoy the nearby play park.
Inspection of this family home is a must!

Description:
What's your story???
If you've ever wanted a great start in a incredibly sort after neighborly estate then you may well find this Hunt Club Treasure appealing to commence the next chapter of your life. Only Six years (approx.)young and presenting impeccably.
First time offered to the marketplace is this authentic four-bedroom, two living area, double lock up garage homely residence on an allotment of 400m2(approx.)
Well positioned in a no through street the home is walking distance within proximity to shops and Transport. A stone's throw to Casey fields sporting complex and only a short stroll to childcare, park land and lakes.
Features stone island kitchen bench tops, heating and cooling and dishwasher.
Perfect for all year round entertaining the alfresco area will accommodate all your family and friends for unlimited gatherings, Master with ensuite all other rooms with BIRs, the kitchen is brilliantly centrally located dividing two generous separate living areas. Featuring a double garage with internal access.
If you've ever wanted to own your own piece prime real estate to create your own story then No 7 Wagner Close may be the one for you.

Description:
Huge Lot in One Village
INVEST or BUILD on this huge 425sqm lot with a 12.50m frontage. Live in this great location and be part of the new community. Live in this new stylish and vibrant neighborhood and enjoy the conveniences of great facilities in the surrounding area near and in One Village. Underpinning the location are sporting and aquatic facilities; Casey Complex and Casey RACE. Located next to One Village is the prestigious Mayfield Estate and nearby shopping centers, medical facilities and a local library for your convenience. Closeby to schools include Casey Grammar, Cranbourne East Primary School, Cranbourne East Secondary School & Chilsolm TAFE. With easy access to Melbourne city and surrounding parklands and reserves provides a relaxed country charm to complete the lifestyle you want. Proposed future shopping Center and potential Cranbourne East Railway Station makes this property an excellent choice to invest or to live in !

Description:
Stunning Unique Family Residence
Imposing 11.5 foot ceiling in the main Living area is one of the several unique features of this stunning 4 bedroom residence with 6.5 star energy rating, located within easy walking distance to Sporting Grounds, School, child care centre, medical centre and future Town centre, Extensive high quality porcelain tiles greet you from the entry and flows through the main living area and which features remote controlled smart fire place adjoins stunning chef quarters includes 900mm appliances, Stone bench tops and walk in pantry,
All 4 bedrooms are ample in size, master with full Ensuite and walk in robe and 2 separate living areas.
Other notable inclusions are direct home access from the Garage, Ducted heating, Evaporative cooling and covered side entertaining area with Spa bath.
Generous size well maintained rear yard with further provision for entertaining, also includes above ground pool and a large garden sheds. First Home Buyers Grant Available subject to State Revenue Office Approval. Definitely one for your must see list as this impeccably presented property wonât last long.
Call Sid on 0430037053 for further details.

Description:
SPECTACULAR CRANBOURNE EAST LIFESTYLE!
Desirably positioned in an urban growth corridor within close proximity of Hunt Club Shopping Centre and Cranbourne Primary School, this two-acre hobby farm represents both wonderful lifestyle and subdivision potential (STCA).
Served by bore water and rainwater tanks, this highly-productive land is divided into three main paddocks with fully fencing, horse stables and ample shedding. The existing residence offers versatile interiors accentuated by three well-proportioned bedrooms, family bathroom and functional kitchen with quality appliances. Multiple living zones ensure space for growing families to relax and unwind. This sprawling residence offers every convenience, with added benefits incorporating heating, cooling and a secure lock-up garage for vehicles and farm machinery.
Situated on the doorstep of major arterials and minutes from local shops (Hunt Club Shopping Centre, Springhill Shopping Centre and Cranbourne Park Shopping Centre), schools (Cranbourne East Primary Secondary and Casey Grammar) and within easy commute of Melbourne CBD, this is the ultimate location with so many advantages.
Enquire now for further details and to arrange inspection!
